Policy Set Params¶

class terrasnek.policy_set_params.TFCPolicySetParams(base_url, org_name, headers, verify)¶

https://www.terraform.io/docs/cloud/api/policy-set-params.html

create(policy_set_id, payload)¶

POST /policy-sets/:policy_set_id/parameters

destroy(policy_set_id, parameter_id)¶

DELETE /policy-sets/:policy_set_id/parameters/:parameter_id

list(policy_set_id)¶

GET /policy-sets/:policy_set_id/parameters

update(policy_set_id, parameter_id, payload)¶
